content.description: Sit start up left side of the overhang.

This is the stand start/mantle portion of the Levitation Project. Stand with hands on the small seam above the lip of the boulder, establish a high right heel and crank your way up to some slopers to eventually find a small slot/crack up and left. Press your way to victory!
content.protection: A pad and a spotter to make sure you don't go rolling down the hill. Also watch out for ground bees in the late fall!
content.location: About 8' to the right of the start of Space Elevator

content.description: To the right of Space Elevator on the steep face. Start matched low on a half pad crimp rail, make a violent move to establish on a a small (half pad) crimp, work your way over the blunt lip of the boulder to a small slopey rail. Top out straight up for full street cred or bail left to the finish of Space Elevator for an easier way out.
content.protection: single pad and spotter. watch your head on the rock.
content.location: 8' to the right of Space Elevator

content.description: Short overhang above and to the right of Grandma's House.
